# Corporate Photographer in Arizona Making Your Business Stand Out  

Leave an impact on your audience with professional images that express the
story and the essence of your business.

Let’s talk

## Professional Photography Services

The services offered to cover these categories include photography, video, and
drone photography and video.

Professional  
Headshots

Photography

## Trusted by

Here are some of the companies I've been proud to work with as a commercial
photographer recently

## How Will the Planning & Photoshoot Be?  

Let’s talk

  * 1

Tell Me About Your Goals

Behind every memorable picture, there’s the time I take to listen to my
clients. This allows me to understand what they want to communicate.

  * 2

Time to Shoot!

All photoshoot sessions are different, but you can trust I will capture
exactly the look you want to showcase, both in studio or on-location
photographs.

  * 3

Review Images

I will set up an online review gallery for you and your team to approve. Once
all images are approved, I will deliver your files.

  * 4

Receive the Final Images

Digital files or prints will be delivered in the requested format. Typically
deliveries are done as digital files in high and low-resolutions. I will
accomodate any specific needs you have.

Let’s talk

## About Ivan Martinez Photography

Hi! My name is Ivan Martinez, and I am a commercial photographer specializing
in business headshots, as well as corporate, advertising, construction, and
events photography.  
  
With 30 years of marketing and advertising experience, I have in-depth
understanding, knowledge and willingness to listen to my clients' needs. This
sets me apart from the rest when it comes to develop compelling images.

## Your Business Presence Is Only as Good as Its Visual Representation

Get high-quality, professional, and consistent photographs to market your
goods and services.

Let’s talk
